memberdef.name: __doc_gr_digital_crc_check
memberdef.initializer:
= R"doc(Check the CRC at the end of a PDU.
The CRC check block receives a PDU containing a CRC at its end, and checks whether the CRC is correct. The PDU is sent over the ok or fail output ports according to the result of this check. It can support any CRC whose size is a multiple of 8 bits between 8 and 64 bits.
Constructor Specific Documentation:
Build the CRC check block.
Args: num_bits : CRC size in bits (must be a multiple of 8) poly : CRC polynomial, in MSB-first notation initial_value : Initial register value final_xor : Final XOR value input_reflected : true if the input is LSB-first, false if not result_reflected : true if the output is LSB-first, false if not swap_endianness : true if the CRC is stored as little-endian in the PDU, false if not discard_crc : If true, the CRC is removed from the PDU before sending it to the output port. If false, the CRC is preserved in the output PDU. skip_header_bytes : gives the number of header byte to skip in the CRC calculation)doc"

memberdef.name: __doc_gr_digital_crc_check_make
memberdef.initializer:
= R"doc(Check the CRC at the end of a PDU.
The CRC check block receives a PDU containing a CRC at its end, and checks whether the CRC is correct. The PDU is sent over the ok or fail output ports according to the result of this check. It can support any CRC whose size is a multiple of 8 bits between 8 and 64 bits.
Constructor Specific Documentation:
Build the CRC check block.
Args: num_bits : CRC size in bits (must be a multiple of 8) poly : CRC polynomial, in MSB-first notation initial_value : Initial register value final_xor : Final XOR value input_reflected : true if the input is LSB-first, false if not result_reflected : true if the output is LSB-first, false if not swap_endianness : true if the CRC is stored as little-endian in the PDU, false if not discard_crc : If true, the CRC is removed from the PDU before sending it to the output port. If false, the CRC is preserved in the output PDU. skip_header_bytes : gives the number of header byte to skip in the CRC calculation)doc"
